entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
